backend/main.mo: Main canister logic for user profiles and multi‑conversation storage with authorization checks and CRUD operations for conversations and entries.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that converts old single‑conversation data structures to the new multi‑conversation format with default timestamps and titles.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two frontend features to their related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend source files including hooks, components, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH color variables and theming for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing authentication, conversation state, message flow, data export, and UI layout.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity authentication with loading states and cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog prompting first‑time users to save a profile name with validation and loading states.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatCompose: A chat input component with text entry, voice transcription, and send handling, syncing local state with external value.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatEmptySt: Displays an introductory empty-state screen with example prompts and feature hints.
frontend/src/components/chat/Conversatio: Renders the chat message list with auto-scrolling, role indicators, TTS controls, and source links.
frontend/src/components/help/Capabilitie: A dialog listing SuperNova’s capabilities, limitations, and usage tips.
frontend/src/components/history/Conversa: Shows a sidebar of conversation summaries with selection, new chat, and optional data export.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useConversationHistor: Manages conversation state, listing, selection, creation, and saving of entries for authenticated users.
frontend/src/hooks/useInformationRetriev: Provides a hook that fetches summaries from Wikipedia and DuckDuckGo, compiles excerpts, and returns a combined summarized result with loading and warning states.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity loading with AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls in React Query hooks for user profiles, conversations, entries, and data export with automatic cache invalidation.
Adds browser speech-to-text functionality with recording control, transcript management, and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useSpeechSynthesis.ts: Provides text-to-speech control through the Web Speech API, managing speech playback state and errors.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, along with typography tweaks.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, setting up QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering the root component.
frontend/src/utils/downloadJson.ts: Creates and downloads a JSON file from provided data using a generated Blob and timestamped filename.
frontend/src/utils/summarize.ts: Generates a short summary from text snippets by extracting initial sentences or truncating long content.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions to read, persist, and clear URL parameters, falling back to sessionStorage and supporting hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration defining theme extensions, color variables, container settings, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state file tracking architecture notes, existing features, and new feature requests for conversation persistence and data export.
